commitResults.messageBody:
- Added greeting and exit lines
- Renamed Chatbot name to Berry

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Greet/Exit lines and rename chatbot
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added greeting and exit lines
- Renamed chatbot from Duke to Berry
- Renamed file Duke.java to Berry.java
The method 'echo' echos commands entered by the user, and exists when the user types the command 'bye'.
Moved the variables and while loop in the echo method into main.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor echo method to addTask and add list method
commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed and updated the echo method so that the method is able to
add tasks to the array, and the new method name reflects its functionality better.
Added a Task class to represent tasks and encapsulate their related data.
Included the line to update the isDone to be false.

Added the toggleTaskStatus method so that the user can mark/unmark the task.

Updated the addTask and list method to work with Task objects instead of Strings.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to comply with coding standard
